publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-103 Brian Adam: Grampian Police Pipe Band Centenary—That the Parliament congratulates Grampian Police Pipe Band which celebrates its centenary in 2007; salutes the band’s participation in many local and international events, and acknowledges that pipe bands are international ambassadors of this country, create opportunities to cultivate musical talents among young people and form an important part of Scotland’s modern culture.

S3M-103 Grampian Police Pipe Band Centenary (lodged on 30 May 2007) Nanette Milne*, Elizabeth Smith*, Rob Gibson*, Kenneth Gibson*, Stuart McMillan*, Willie Coffey*, Bill Wilson*, Alex Johnstone*, Sandra White*, Nigel Don*, Michael Matheson*, Christina McKelvie*, Roseanna Cunningham*, Bill Kidd*, Mr Jamie Stone*, Christine Grahame*, Bashir Ahmad*

S3M-103 Brian Adam: Grampian Police Pipe Band Centenary—That the Parliament congratulates Grampian Police Pipe Band which celebrates its centenary in 2007; salutes the band’s participation in many local and international events, and acknowledges that pipe bands are international ambassadors of this country, create opportunities to cultivate musical talents among young people and form an important part of Scotland’s modern culture. Supported by: Nanette Milne, Elizabeth Smith, Rob Gibson, Kenneth Gibson, Stuart McMillan, Willie Coffey, Bill Wilson, Alex Johnstone, Sandra White, Nigel Don, Michael Matheson, Christina McKelvie, Roseanna Cunningham, Bill Kidd, Mr Jamie Stone, Christine Grahame, Bashir Ahmad, Gil Paterson*, Jamie Hepburn*
S3M-103 Grampian Police Pipe Band Centenary (lodged on 30 May 2007) Joe FitzPatrick*, Alison McInnes*
S3M-103 Grampian Police Pipe Band Centenary (lodged on 30 May 2007) Alasdair Allan*
S3M-103 Grampian Police Pipe Band Centenary (lodged on 30 May 2007) Nicol Stephen*
